original_text: Yes, you should continue to obey God while you are waiting for Christ to return. God has chosen that day. Try to live in a way that will make that day come soon. On that day, fire will burn the whole sky. The sky will no longer be there. Heat will destroy the universe.
korean_text: 하나님의 날이 임하기를 바라보고 간절히 사모하라 그 날에 하늘이 불에 타서 풀어지고 물질이 뜨거운 불에 녹아지려니와

sentences.original_text: Yes, you should continue to obey God
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 너는 계속해서 하나님께 순종해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: while you are waiting for Christ to return
Try to live in a way
that will make that day come soon
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날이 속히 오게 할 그런 방식으로

sentences.original_text: On that day, fire will burn the whole sky
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에 불이 온 하늘을 태울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The sky will no longer be there
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘은 더 이상 존재하지 않을 것입니다
